comments.en:
Japanese version of the Epson Stylus Photo EX.

Supports A3 paper size.

Works relatively well with the Stylus Color 600 upp files, such as stc600p.upp

The Gimp/Ghostscript print driver (stp) supports this printer perfectly -- 1440x720, soft weave, 6 color dithering.

Consumables/Refills: 1 black cartridge, 1 color cartridge
